column4: Hi. Looking for a program that will synchronize the contents (file by file) of my usb drive and my home directory. If file.usb is newer than file.home, file.usb is the file copied to both drives. And vice versa. More complex than simply copying a drive. Any ideas?
try unison, thats what i use
Heh. Was not expecting that to come up on the first hit on google. Thanks!
